job.title: Data Scientist
job.description:
Energetic Insurance is developing novel risk management solutions to unlock exponential growth in renewable and distributed energy. We are backed by one of the largest insurance companies in the world and our flagship product enables financing of commercial solar projects. We are venture backed and have received grant funding from the US Department of Energy, the Commonwealth of Massachusetts and support from multiple incubator programs.In the role of Data Scientist, you will be responsible for designing and prototyping new analyses for Energetic Insurance as well as incrementally improving existing analyses based on new available data sources. This role will require the Data Scientist to integrate effectively with the entire rest of the company;- with Underwriting for assessing risk for various industry verticals,- with Product development for establishing the methodology to price new products, and - with Software Engineering for implementing and integrating models into production codeThe vast majority of the work will be in the R programming language.
Salary commensurate with experience. This job is located in Boston, MA. Energetic Insurance is an equal opportunity employer and strongly encourages people from diverse backgrounds to apply.
